title: Foldable Dual Screen Notebooks Done RIGHT!
description: The Dell Ori is a foldable dual screen notebook that has some amazing features we haven't seen yet.  While its a concept at CES 2020, the Dell Duet is something a bit more final and boy is it cool, especially the way it handles a movable keyboard.
